<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to split the offset across two ADDIs. We need to keep the stack pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aligned after each ADDI. We need to determine the maximum value we can put</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in each ADDI. In the negative direction, we can use -2048 which is always</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sufficiently aligned. In the positive direction, we need to find the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// largest 12-bit immediate that is aligned. Exclude -4096 since it can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// created with LU12I.W.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a74d93035f53f5e8c2aaea5a8f307972d">getStackAlign</a>().value() &lt; 2048 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Stack alignment too large&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t MaxPosAdjStep = 2048 - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a74d93035f53f5e8c2aaea5a8f307972d">getStackAlign</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Val &gt; -4096 &amp;&amp; Val &lt;= (2 &#42; MaxPosAdjStep)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Val -= FirstAdj;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScavSlotsNum = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Far branches beyond 27-bit offset require a spill slot for scratch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsLargeFunction = !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;27&gt;</a>(<a href="#a02d23368b0ce7bd846cc8270dd411aa9">estimateFunctionSizeInBytes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>, MF));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsLargeFunction)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ScavSlotsNum = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// estimateStackSize has been observed to under-estimate the final stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size, so give ourselves wiggle-room by checking for stack size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// representable an 11-bit signed field rather than 12-bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;11&gt;</a>(MFI.estimateStackSize(MF)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ScavSlotsNum = std::max(ScavSlotsNum, 1u);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For CFR spill.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a82664dbdf3b82d6f0310a7dc9820252d">needScavSlotForCFR</a>(MF))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++ScavSlotsNum;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We would like to split the SP adjustment to reduce prologue/epilogue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as following instructions. In this way, the offset of the callee saved</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register could fit in a single store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addi.d  $sp, $sp, -2032</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   st.d    $ra, $sp,  2024</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   st.d    $fp, $sp,  2016</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   addi.d  $sp, $sp,   -16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loongarchframelowering/#a3290bcbb58f1e5d0c6006373c1e55053"><span class="doxyHighlight">uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loongarchframelowering/#a3290bcbb58f1e5d0c6006373c1e55053">LoongArchFrameLowering::getFirstSPAdjustAmount</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the FirstSPAdjustAmount if the StackSize can not fit in a signed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 12-bit and there exists a callee-saved register needing to be pushed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;12&gt;</a>(MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a14c39a24bf6ebbe339ae8a453c7fdd11">getStackSize</a>()) &amp;&amp; (CSI.size() &gt; 0)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FirstSPAdjustAmount is chosen as (2048 - StackAlign) because 2048 will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cause sp = sp + 2048 in the epilogue to be split into multiple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions. Offsets smaller than 2048 can fit in a single load/store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction, and we have to stick with the stack alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So (2048 - StackAlign) will satisfy the stack alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 2048 - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a74d93035f53f5e8c2aaea5a8f307972d">getStackAlign</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>();</span></CodeLine>
